name: immaculately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is perfectly clean or tidy: The cemeteries of Gallipoli are immaculately kept. The seafront is kept immaculately tidy by an army of street cleaners. immaculately dressed
in a way that is perfect and has no mistakes: He wore an immaculately tailored three-piece suit. David Cronenberg's film is deftly structured, beautifully paced, and immaculately shot. See
immaculate
More examplesFewer examplesThis is an immaculately presented three-bedroom house.It is quite difficult to keep the lane immaculately clean because it is cobbled and lots of little bits and pieces get caught in the stones.We watched her wipe an invisible tear from an immaculately made-up cheek.His art is always immaculately constructed.
